Phase 1 of the Mamatoto project delivered several key outcomes that significantly improved maternal healthcare accessibility and efficiency.

## Benefits

- **Increased Enrollment**: Over n% of the target population successfully enrolled via WhatsApp.
- **Accurate Data Management**: Integrated systems ensured reliable data collection and storage.
- **Improved Healthcare Delivery**: Real-time updates and reminders improved antenatal care attendance.

## Long-Term Impact

- Strengthened healthcare systems for scalability.
- Enhanced trust among users in digital healthcare platforms.
